articles.author: Michael Birnbaum
articles.title: As Trump meets U.S. allies, America’s friends see a new world order - The Washington Post
articles.description: The president’s ally-filled June begins with an Oval Office meeting Thursday with German Chancellor Friedrick Merz.
articles.content:
When President Donald Trump first barreled into office in 2017, he was the disrupter among world leaders, many of whom sought to wait out what they hoped would be a four-year blip in U.S. history.
